name: Game Nihonshi: Kakumeiji Oda Nobunaga
overview: Game Nihonshi Kakumeiji Oda Nobunaga was released for the Playstation & Saturn consoles the game is a sort of an encyclopedia about Nobunaga's life using an anime cartoon movie and featured a complete database of the different personalities of the time, leaders, territories, armies, weapons, etc. with lots of pictures and texts.
